sen.j: 口伝（くでん）とは、情報伝達方法の一つで、口頭で伝えること。
sen.e: "Kuden" is a method of orally transmitting information.
sen.cmt: 後列と一文にまとめました。
sen.e: "Kuden" is a method of orally transmitting information.
"Kuden" is a method of orally transmitting information.
It is also called kuchizutae.

It is also called kuchizutae.

sen.j: また、伝える行為や伝えられる事柄そのものを指す。
sen.e: "Kuden" also means a manner or information itself handed down from mouth to ear.
"Kuden" also means the act or the matter itself of transmitting information.
sen.cmt: 文脈より修正しました。
sen.e: "Kuden" also means the act or the matter itself of transmitting information.

sen.j: 同義語に口承、伝説、伝承。
sen.e: "Kosho", "densetsu" and "densho" are synonyms of "kuden".
"Kosho," "densetsu" and "densho" are synonyms of "kuden."
sen.cmt: カンマ、ピリオドの位置をそれぞれ修正しました。
sen.e: "Kosho," "densetsu" and "densho" are synonyms of "kuden."

sen.j: 1から転じて、伝統芸能や武道などの芸道において、師匠が弟子に流派の奥義や秘伝を口伝えに教授すること。
sen.e: The word "kuden" has extended its meaning from the above 1 to mean that a master of traditional performance art or martial art orally teaches his or her disciples esoteric knowledge or secret techniques unique to each school of the art.

The word "kuden" has extended its meaning from the above 1, to mean that a master of traditional performance art or martial art orally teaches his or her disciples, the esoteric knowledge or secret techniques unique to each school of the art.
sen.cmt: カンマ、the を補いました。
sen.e: The word "kuden" has extended its meaning from the above 1, to mean that a master of traditional performance art or martial art orally teaches his or her disciples, the esoteric knowledge or secret techniques unique to each school of the art.

sen.j: また、そうして授受される奥義や秘伝のこと。
sen.e: It also means esoteric knowledge or secret techniques thus passed on between them.
It also refers to the esoteric knowledge or secret techniques, passed on in this way.
sen.cmt: means→refers to,the, カンマを補いました。thus を削除しました。between them→in this way と修正しました。
sen.e: It also refers to the esoteric knowledge or secret techniques, passed on in this way.

sen.j: 流派の重要事項や秘匿事項が必要以上に外部に知られるのを避けるために行われる。
sen.e: Important matters or secrets about each school of art are orally passed on in order to protect such information from being known to outsiders more than necessary.
Important matters or secret matters of each schools are orally passed on, in order to protect such information from being known to outsiders more than necessary.
sen.cmt: 文脈より修正しました。カンマを補いました。
sen.e: Important matters or secret matters of each schools are orally passed on, in order to protect such information from being known to outsiders more than necessary.

sen.j: 同義語に口訣（こうけつ）、口授（くじゅ、こうじゅ）があるが、現代ではあまり使われない。
sen.e: Although "koketsu" and "koju (or kuju)" are synonyms of "kuden" in this meaning, they are not so much used these days.
Although "koketsu" and "koju [or kuju]" are the synonyms of "kuden" in this meaning, they are not so much used these days.

sen.e: Although "koketsu" and "koju [or kuju]" are the synonyms of "kuden" in this meaning, they are not so much used these days.

sen.j: 2から転じて、奥義や秘伝を記した書物。
sen.e: The word "kuden" has further extended its meaning from the above 2 to mean a book of esoteric knowledge or secret techniques.
The word "kuden" has further extended its meaning from the above 2, to mean the book recorded the esoteric knowledge or secret techniques.

sen.j: 継承内容の正確性などが向上する反面、外部への情報漏洩の危険性は高まる。
sen.e: By transcribing information to be handed down, preciseness of the information can be improved while the risk of information leak is increased.

sen.e: Some historical novels and plays depict events involving such books.
Some period novels and dramas depict incidents involving such books.
